transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Hello. Haan.
Executive: Haan ji, Sumit ji baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Kaun bol rahe ho?
Executive: Jitender ji baat kar raha tha sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Achcha ye bhi aap hi ke hai kya number?
Customer: Haan ji?
Customer: Ye bhi aap hi ke hai kya number naye naye number se phone aa raha hai.
Executive: Ah naye number se isliye phone aa rahe hain kyunki ek to mere manager jo hai woh aap se baat karna chah rahe the kyunki ek to ah aapne matlab negative feedback bhi diya hai na is vajah se sir.
Customer: Woh to main shuru se deta aa raha hu yaar ab naya thodi naya thodi kar diya maine.
Executive: Nahi nahi woh woh main aapki baat se bilkul sehmat hu sir lekin hamare jo sir hai woh aaj available hai, theek hai? Main unse abhi main aapki baat kara deta hu jo finally jo cheeze hone wali hai jo bhi sari cheeze hongi please aap ek baar unse bata dijiye ki kya hai kya nahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good afternoon sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji sir, ah, yehi keh rahe the ki aapne statement diya tha aur account aapka, kya reason hai matlab?
Customer: Kya bol rahe ho? Awaaz break ho raha hai. Kya bol rahe ho?
Executive: Meri team ne, meri team, meri team ne last month se jo aap se baat kiya hai, main head baat kar raha hu yaha se.
Customer: Awaaz break ho raha hai kya bolna chah rahe ho samajh mein nahi aa raha kuch bhi.
Executive: Main dusre number se call pe kar raha hu sir aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving calls from new numbers.

- Customer is not able to hear clearly.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for calling from new numbers.

- Executive offered to connect the customer to his manager.

- Executive offered to call from another number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, manager, call, account
